What are the genetic changes related to mucolipidosis II alpha/beta ?,"Mutations in the GNPTAB gene cause mucolipidosis II alpha/beta. This gene provides instructions for making part of an enzyme called GlcNAc-1-phosphotransferase. This enzyme hel
